EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal_Roadshow_Q216.Reminder - DC
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Cloud Native Roadshow taking place tomorrow in DC. We look forward to seeing you there!
Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow—DC Thursday, June 9th, 2016 8:30am – 9:30am Breakfast 9:30am – 12:00pm Sessions 12:00pm – 1:00pm Lunch 1:00pm – 3:30pm Sessions Roadshow Agenda <[[http://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/arlington?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pivotal-roadshow-2016-DC]]>
Location Virginia Tech Executive Briefing Center <[[http://www.ncr.vt.edu/engagement/executive_briefing_center.html]]> Ballston Room 900 N. Glebe Road Arlington, VA 22203 Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/900+N+Glebe+Rd,+Arlington,+VA+22203/@38.8808065,-77.1179587,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x89b7b43b140a7197:0xa2f38dce30865c49!8m2!3d38.8808065!4d-77.11577]]> Transportation <[[http://www.ncr.vt.edu/discovery/research_center_arlington.html]]>
Questions? Contact Kathryn Efird at kefird@pivotal.io <[[mailto:kefird@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you tomorrow!
The Pivotal Team
